post:
Hello LET Family,

Abc-Hosters is promoting our NAT VPS service that came online last month and is still growing. We have been in the web provider industry since 2009.  To help make our NAT VPS service better we have made 13 Available NAT VPS servers to start off with FREE!!! This offer is available in our Paris, France Datacenter for the time being. May add to our Atlanta NAT service soon. Let me know what you think about it.

Details about the Freedom France Plan:

Unmanaged

1CPU Core (Shared fair use)

64MB RAM 

0MB vSwap

5GB Disk
100GB Bandwidth

19 NAT IPv4 Ports + 1 SSH Port

OpenVZ/ProxmoxCP via the Billing Area

Setup Time may take 24-48 hours.

[Order Link](http://www.abc-hosters.com/client/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=0)

At this time we are not offering IPv6 addresses, only NAT IPv4 address with 19 NAT IPv4 Ports + 1 SSH Port.

[Abc-hosters.com](http://www.abc-hosters.com/) | [About Us](http://www.abc-hosters.com/about.html) | [Support](http://www.abc-hosters.com/client/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1)
